## Emitter.addEventListener() method

Add a listener to a specific event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEventListener<K extends keyof E>(eventName: K, listener: (data: E[K]) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | K | The name of the event |
|  listener | (data: E\[K\]) =&gt; void | A listener function that takes as parameter the payload of the event |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
